title: Blogstar call and new blog update
author: VD
content_html:
If you want to try to hurdle the bar set by Khross next week, throw in your BLOG NAME and its URL. Voxologisti only.

In other news, three new blogs join the blogroll this week. Well, two new blogs, whilst one of my favorite names, FEEDING RAINBOWS TO UNICORNS has transformed into the rather more dubiously titled MIND FISTS. Check them out if you are so inclined….

Mind Fists
In Deo Veritas
Political Mexican
